{
    "number": 168378,
    "data": "3,11,11,19,19,27,27,35,35,43,43,51,51,59,59,67,67,75,75,83,83,91,91,99,99,107,107,115,115,123,123,131,131,139,139,147,147,155,155,163,163,171,171,179,179,187,187,195,195,203,203,211,211,219,219,227,227,235,235",
    "name": "a(n) = 3 + 8*floor(n/2).",
    "comment": [
        "More generally, the sequences generated by the recursive relation b(n) = h*n - b(n-1) + k, with b(1)=c and h, k, c, prefixed integers, have the closed form b(n) = (2*h*n + (3*h + 2*k - 4*c)*(-1)^n + h + 2*k)/4. Also, if 2*c = h+k, then b(n) = c + h*floor(n/2); if 2*c = 2*h+k, then b(n) = c + h*floor((n-1)/2); if 2*c = k, b(n) = c + h*floor((n+1)/2). - _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 18 2013"
    ],
    "link": [
        "Vincenzo Librandi, <a href=\"/A168378/b168378.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000</a>",
        "<a href=\"/index/Rec#order_03\">Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients</a>, signature (1,1,-1)."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = 8*n - a(n-1) - 2, with n>1, a(1)=3.",
        "G.f.: x*(3 + 8*x - 3*x^2)/((1+x)*(x-1)^2). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2013",
        "a(n) = a(n-1) +a(n-2) -a(n-3). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2013",
        "a(n) = 4*n + 2*(-1)^n + 1. - _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 18 2013",
        "a(n) = A168381(n) + 1 = A168398(n) - 1. - _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 18 2013",
        "E.g.f.: (4*x + 3)*cosh(x) + (4*x - 1)*sinh(x) - 3. - _G. C. Greubel_, Jul 19 2016"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "Table[ 3 + 8*floor(n/2), {n,60}] (* _Bruno Berselli_, Sep 18 2013 *)",
        "CoefficientList[Series[(3 + 8 x - 3 x^2)/((1 + x) (x - 1)^2), {x, 0, 70}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2013 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [3+8*Floor(n/2): n in [1..70]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2013"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A017101, A168381, A168398."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,easy",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 24 2009",
    "ext": [
        "New definition by _Vincenzo Librandi_, Sep 18 2013"
    ],
    "references": 2,
    "revision": 34,
    "time": "2016-07-20T02:06:12-04:00",
    "created": "2010-06-01T03:00:00-04:00"
}
